name: Trees!
description:
Where's Ulric?

Your brother, Ulric, has been in the woods all day and it's starting to get dark out. You're getting worried - you decide to go find him.  You, and your cat companion, (who floats instead of walks because of an unfortunate run-in with a witch) of course. In the forest, you find that there are these magical trees who will not let you pass unless you answer their riddles. Will you pass the riddles and find your brother, or will you be bound to wander the forest forever?

Controls
  • Move with 'WASD'
  • Answer questions by clicking the pointer
Features
  • 3D Role-Playing Game
  • Medieval art style
  • 3 Opponents
  • Turn-based opponent questions
  • Open-source music by Mid-Air Machine
  • Open-source fonts by Dennis Ludlow and Dieter Steffmann
  • Open-source sounds by Eponn and Raclure
